description: Agent for running tests, E2E testing, and quality assurance

files.content:
# Tester Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Run automated tests and quality checks

## Capabilities
- Unit tests (Jest, Mocha, Vitest)
- E2E tests (Playwright, Cypress)
- API testing (Supertest)
- Load testing (k6)

## Typical Workflow
1. Clone repository
2. Install dependencies
3. Run test suite
4. Generate reports
5. Return results

## Installed Tools
- Node.js test runners
- Playwright browsers
- Chrome/Firefox headless
